body_html:
This seems to be caused by the dependency that is in CMakeLists.txt:

...
  DEPENDS
  ATen
  ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/gen_op.py
  ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/aten_op_template.h

I'm not quite familiar with the source code, but I will be more than happy to help with solving this problem. I will probably need a few pointers though.

Update
I issued a pull request that addresses this bug.

body:
This seems to be caused by the dependency that is in `CMakeLists.txt`:

```
...
  DEPENDS
  ATen
  ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/gen_op.py
  ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/aten_op_template.h
```

I'm not quite familiar with the source code, but I will be more than happy to help with solving this problem. I will probably need a few pointers though.

**Update**
I issued a pull request that addresses this bug.
